doc.field: International Association of Bridge, Structural and Ornamental Iron Workers, Local 580 Records
International Association of Bridge, Structural and Ornamental Iron Workers, Local 580 Records
Subject files arranged alphabetically from Accident Reports to New York City Central Labor Council. Also includes material on the Office of Safety and Health Administration (OSHA)
